about.title: Hi There !
about.descr: My name is Valera Kozlov. I'm a self-learning software / web developer. üíª Mostly I have been working around web development in my career. Cross-browser and adaptive website layout. Using the BEM methodology. Check out Work to see some projects that I have worked on.

contact.title: Lets Talk !
contact.descr: Let's have a chat and see to what kind of an amazing project we are headed to. Drop me an email or contact me through my social medias, you are always welcome to say HI !!
